data.title: My Portfolio
data.description: The project you are looking right now! I have built this web to show a little bit about myself, my work experience and personal projects. I designed it with a mobile first approach with used React JS and Redux for the front end and Python for the back end.

data.title: Algorithms and Data Structures
data.description: Interested in algorithms and data structures? I have completed almost all of the problems in Cracking The Code Interview Book using Python. I am really into this challenging problems and I am always up to improve my problem-solving skills.
